Package com.epita.creeps.given.extra

Class Cartographer

java.lang.Object
com.epita.creeps.given.extra.Cartographer
public class Cartographer extends Object
Utility class to store global block data.

    • requestTileInfo

      public int requestTileInfo(@NotNull @NotNull Point position)
      Request the information of the tile at the given position. If the tile is a resource tile, this is the quantity of resources left. If the tile is owned by a player, this is that player's ID.
      Parameters:
      position - the requested position.
      Returns:
      the information at the given position.

    • requestOfType

      public Stream<Point> requestOfType(@NotNull @NotNull Tile tile)
      Given a Tile, return a Stream of coordinates where tiles of that type have been registered in the Cartographer.
      Parameters:
      tile - the tiles that will be returned
      Returns:
      the stream of points corresponding to tiles of the given type.

    • requestBuildingsOf

      public Stream<Point> requestBuildingsOf(@NotNull @javax.validation.constraints.NotNull int playerId)
      Given a played ID, return a Stream of coordinates where buildings of that player have been registered in the Cartographer.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player that own the buildings.
      Returns:
      the stream of points corresponding to buildings owned by the given player.

    • registerSingleTile

      public void registerSingleTile(@NotNull @NotNull Point position, @NotNull @NotNull Tile tile, @NotNull @Min(0L) @javax.validation.constraints.NotNull,@javax.validation.constraints.Min(0L) int info)
      Updates the given position with the new Tile and its info. Info can be the player owning the tile or the quantity of resources.
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the tile to update.
      tile - the type of the new Tile.
      info - the tile's info.
